Hi, welcome to Flower Power (name subject to change)! This app will ensure that flower lovers are able to take care of their plants while checking the weather. Users are able to type in almost every city in the world and are able to get the temperature reading and a message explaing how to take care of their plant.\n\n
Thanks to VClouds @ DevianArt for the photos! (http://vclouds.deviantart.com/art/VClouds-Weather-Icons-179152045)
